reviews.review_text: I love this company!!! I just got a replacement for my Ultra Body Wrap and this product is amazing. I got the soft pink wrap and it is wonderful to curl up with and has an amazing scent. The customer service is exceptional. Highly recommend ****  Thank you Warm Buddy Co.

As a family who has survived cancer, we appreciate this wonderful product. I have used magic bag in the past and found that the warm buddy is my preference.  I support local and buy made in Canada products.       everybody needs a warm buddy and a warm HUG.
Warm Buddy products are both therapeutic and cute. From a retailer perspective (as we have been for 7 years) they sell very well!

I work at Warm Buddy co. At work I started getting an Aura, which means im getting a migrane. I  warmed up Spa Wrap and put it around my neck and warmed up the Sleep Mask as well. I was able to stave off the headache and my Aura disappeared faster than it would have without the warm buddy products. My entire family uses Warm Buddies. We use them for everything from aches and pains, to warming us up on those cold nights! Even our dog loves her Warm Buddies.

I have been using Warm Buddy products for years and have given away as gifts many, many products. I couldnt survive my back pain without my Warm Buddy heat pad.  This is a fabulous company and I highly recommend their products! B. Bottomley

My whole family uses and loves Warm Buddy heat wraps to warm up beds at night, treat stomach aches and just for general comfort and stress relief. They can also be used cold to cool off on these hot summer nights. I use my body wrap to help relieve back/shoulder pain after tennis, golf or workouts. Works way better than pain medication! We have given many Warm Buddy animals to our family and friends as gifts and everybody loves them. They also warm-up!

I had the most horrifying experience with this company today at the ESI spa show here in Vancouver. It was quite busy at the show with many woman in front of me at their booth looking at their lovely things they had to showcase and sell. It included their stuffed animals (warm buddies) , cozy robes and other warming bottles. Everyone was touching and feeling and when it was my turn I asked the woman how much the teddy bears were. She replied in a very rude tone  they re all a different price . Ok well how much is this one I asked, I would like to buy it for my daughter. $20 dollars! She said rudely and so I handed it to my daughter and went to get my wallet when she said  give me that one back or pay for it first if you want to see anything else, nobody wants to buy one that a child has touched . I was so shocked! So shocked. And so were the other women (whom I didn t know). They all put the items down that they were looking at it. And one woman said that s the rudest thing someone could ve said. Especially a salesperson trying to sell their product! A child s product ! I was not only embarrassed and mortified about the situation, but my daughter was so upset when I told her I m sorry we aren t going to buy this anymore. 15 minutes later when I was walking around a woman from a different booth approached me and said she was so sorry for what that woman said to me and my daughter. It was so extremely rude and unprofessional. They really should not have this woman representing their company. ( she was wearing a lime green long sleeve underneath her black vest with short hair)  Hopefully the owner reads this and addresses this issue so it never happens again to anyone else. I can t imagine anyone wanting to support a company like this. I know I can t. EDIT: Thank Karen for replying to me. I do accept your apology and I can understand that it was quite busy and probably would ve added to your probably stressful day. I was just really wanting to buy a warm buddy for my daughter. Thank you so very much for your offer of sending her a warm buddy, she will be so happy about this.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: I am so sorry that you had a bad experience with my company. I was attempting to find a Warm Buddy for your daughter as you said you were not sure which one she would like. That is what I understood. I was in the process of bringing choices for your daughter to see. What was going on at the same time was a customer wanting a Warm Buddy that had not been handled. Normally I would have allowed your daughter to keep the labrador she had while I brought more options. I wanted to explain what happened as I did realize that you were not happy. This show can get very busy and I am sorry that you left without our resolving the situation. I am the owner of the company who you referred to and this situation is not what my company is about.  It is always my intention to have happy customers and for everybody to have access to our products. I would be very happy to send your daughter a Warm Buddy as that is what my intention was at the time. Warm Buddy options can be seen on our website. Kindly accept my apology as there seems to have been a misunderstanding which caused stress for you. Please contact us at info@warmbuddy.com with a product choice and shipping address, I will be very happy to send you a Warm Buddy for your daughter. Again, please accept my sincere apologies for the unfortunate experience. Warmest regards, Karen

reviews.review_text: The products are super cozy, the quality is excellent and the customer service is really efficient with quick response and solutions ;))

reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Greg! They are truly amazing products. Get them now to be cozy during this holiday season :)

reviews.review_text: Poor customer service - I bought a pair of slippers for my girlfriend and she said they didn t fit (they fit smaller than the sizes listed). I contacted them twice about an exchange and they do not respond. I also found it weird that for a Canadian company I was charged is USD.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello John, Im so sorry to hear about your bad experience. We pride ourselves in excellent customer service. I have reviewed your order, but I dont have any correspondence after we shipped your order. I will call you tomorrow to resolve this issue. We will guarantee customer satisfaction. Again, please accept our apology, and I hope to speak with you soon. Warm Buddy Team
